availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Gerhard Henry Frommeyer (Hamilton County, Ohio, resident.)

body.p: Hamilton County, Ohio, resident. Native of Germany. Married to Mary Elizabeth Obeldcher Frommeyer in Hamilton County, Ohio, on October 1, 1848. Resident of Hamilton County in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Ohio Marriage Records, 1774-1993, Hamilton County Marriages, Film 000344460.
"Frommeyer, Gerhard H. (Death, 1886-10-24)," Cincinnati Birth and Death Records, University of Cincinnati Library, accessed November 16, 2023, https://drc.libraries.uc.edu/items/41124174-8996-45b5-9651-7639639d6e23.
